content:
Vaanava manmaya maddhyasthhan
Vachanaathmakanaam daivatthe
Kanyaka pettaall-aashcharyam thanne.
Agnijvaalaavrthanaayon
Deham poondee lokatthil
Naranaayu vannaan-aashcharyam thanne.
Ompathu maasam vaanudare
Maathrvrathatthe neekkaathe
Jaatham cheythaan-aashcharyam thanne.
Muppathu varsham svahithampol
Vaaniha vaanerippoyaan
Haaleluyyaa-aashcharyam thanne.
